text: Rupert Neville Hine (21 September 1947 â€“ 4 June 2020) was an English musician, singer-songwriter and record producer. He produced albums for artists including Rush, Kevin Ayers, Tina Turner, Howard Jones, Saga, The Fixx, Bob Geldof, Thompson Twins, Stevie Nicks, Chris de Burgh, Suzanne Vega, Underworld, Duncan Sheik, Formula and Eleanor McEvoy. He also recorded eleven albums under the band name Thinkman, and was a member of the band Quantum Jump. He was born in London. Hine died on 4 June 2020 in London from cancer, aged 72. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:English singer-songwriters Category:English record producers Category:Singers from London Category:Musicians from London Category:Writers from London
title: Rupert Hine
